column4: Hallo - I just got the following error while updating package list: "W: GPG error: http://security.ubuntu.com hoary-security Release: The following signatures were invalid: BADSIG 40976EAF437D05B5 Ubuntu Archive Automatic Signing Key <ftpmaster@ubuntu.com>"
you may be behind a proxy giving you older copy of files
I am behind a proxy - so I should just wait for the proxy to update its cache - or I can do something about that ?
